caption:
THANK YOU to everyone who participated in Boston Marathon Giving Day 2025!😭💙💛

Together, we raised $1,871,576 for 176 non-profits yesterday on #BostonMarathonGivingDay!🦄 Don’t forget, there is still time to donate to these runners’ causes by clicking the 🔗 in bio.

We are now exactly 1️⃣ MONTH away from the 129th running of the Boston Marathon presented by @BankofAmerica🤯 See you on April 21st for #Boston129! #MeetTheMoment
